title: New Safe Vaccine
cleaned_text:
What would cause people to be afraid of the mRNA vaccines if I may ask?

I'm currently unvaccinated, although I am looking to get it at some point. I was thinking Moderna but this post leads me to believe that it actually matters what type of vaccine you get. Cause to be honest I know nothing about vaccine technology, maybe Novavax is something to consider.

If Novavax actually the best covid vaccine out there like some sources may claim then hey, I guess it paid off for me and several other people to be cautious and wait it out for a bit rather than to just take whatever is readily available.
